title: SHANIA TWAIN - LIVE IN CONCERT - 1999 [2 concerts](region free)
description:
** SHANIA TWAIN ~ LIVE IN CONCERT ~ {1999} [2 Concerts] (region free) FS PAL DVD **


           *** (AKA) SHANIA TWAIN - 'THE SPECIALS' LIVE IN CONCERT DVD ***


FEATURING THE TV SPECIALS ~ The 'WINTER BREAK' Concert + The 'COME ON OVER' Concert


Also includes performances by ELTON JOHN and the BACKSTREET BOYS

This DVD hasn't ever been released on NTSC DVD in America as far as I know yet... and doesn't seem to be listed in the Internet Movie Datbase as far as I could see!



Genre: Live Music Video in Concert

Total Run time:     90 Minutes

DVD Picture Format: PAL DVD

DVD Sound Format:   AC3 Dolby Digital

Language:           *ENGLISH ONLY*

Subtitles:          (No Subtitles... alas... They didn't release the DVD with any)


SHANIA TWAIN is one of the US country's hottest performers in any genre of music
and the passion, energy and excitement of her live performances and recordings
have captured the hearts of millions of fans.

She is the only female artist in US history to achieve back to back Diamond Awards
(sales of 10 million) selling albums in a short period of time.

Her most popular album COME ON OVER is the all time best selling album by a female
artist in the US with RIAA certified sales of 18 million.

Shania's two hugely successful network aired television special live concerts,
*WINTER BREAK* and *COME ON OVER are both included on this DVD in their entirety
as originally broadcast!

Her FIRST network special of her live concert, *WINTER BREAK* aired on CBS on March
1999. It was filmed in both Miami, Florida, USA and in Timins, Ontario, CANADA. The
special guest performances include SHANIA TWAIN in duets with ELTON JOHN as well as
a solo performance of one of her songs by the BACKSTREET BOYS.

Her SECOND network special of another of her live concerts, *COME ON OVER* aired in
the US on November of 1999 from the Superbowl in Dallas, Texas, USA and features a
guest appearance from the Dallas Cowboy Cheerleaders, as well as footage of Shania
backstage fooling around in the locker room and preparing for her performance!


THE CONCERT PERFORMANCE for the *WINTER BREAK* Concert includes: ---

01) * SHANIA initially in Timmins, Ontario, CANADA arriving to the concert on a
      jet ski!

02) * MAN! I FEEL LIKE A WOMAN!

03) * HONEY, I'M HOME!

04) * ALL I HAVE TO GIVE (Performed by the BACKSTREET BOYS!)

05) * SHANIA talks live outdoors about her childhood

06) * YOU'RE STILL THE ONE  +  SOMETHING ABOUT THE WAY YOU LOOK TONIGHT... in duet
      medley with ELTON JOHN

07) * AMNERIS' LETTER in medley with ELTON JOHN

08) * SHANIA talks about the beginning of her career

09) * THAT DON'T IMPRESS ME MUCH

10) * SHANIA remembers her parents

11) * FROM THIS MOMENT ON in conjunction with the BACKSTREET BOYS

12) * DON'T BE STUPID (YOU KNOW I LOVE YOU) - sung in conjunction with LEAHY

13) * IF YOU'RE NOT IN IT FOR LOVE, I'M OUTTA HERE!

14) * Credits



THE CONCERT PERFORMANCE for the *COME ON OVER* Concert includes: ---

01) * Pre Show / Pre Game highlights with SHANIA

02) * HONEY, I'M HOME!

03) * ROCK THIS COUNTRY!

04) * SHANIA mucking around in the Locker Room

05) * DON'T BE STUPID, YOU KNOW I LOVE YOU!

06) * COME ON OVER

07) * YOU'RE STILL THE ONE

08) * SHANIA outside with the DALLAS COWBOY CHEERLEADERS

09) * MAN! I FEEL LIKE A WOMAN!

10) * SHANIA outside on the field with the DALLAS COWBOYS TEAM

11) * ANY MAN OF MINE

12) * THAT DON'T IMPRESS ME MUCH

13) * IF YOU'RE NOT IN IT FOR LOVE, I'M OUTTA HERE!

14) * Credits



All menus etc. are intact... I've only removed the copy protection and region coding! The rest of the DVD remains fully intact the way it was released!
